subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tim Thomas, who has emerged as one of the N.H.L.’s top goaltenders, told the Boston Bruins that he was thinking about sitting out next season — apparently for family reasons.
snippet: Tim Thomas, who has emerged as one of the N.H.L.’s top goaltenders, told the Boston Bruins that he was thinking about sitting out next season — apparently for family reasons.
